title: What are some of the uses a laptop has? - Quora

response.answer_text: A laptop is useful for portable computing. As in… wherever you need a computer, you’ve got a computer. You might as well as what the uses are for a computer. Which would be an odd question, since you are using one now. Even if it is shaped like a phone… it is a computer. It is quite absurd to start listing all the uses of a computer. Your question is a WIMI…. meaning that at some point you are going to want to respond with “What I Mean Is” and the proceed to explain the actual question you want an answer to. A computer is similar to a swiss army knife. It has far more uses than most users will ever put to use. Feel like composing a symphony, and listening to it go together, piece by piece? Use a computer to compose it. Doesn’t matter if it is a laptop or a desktop… but the laptop means you can work at the park, or the library, or the cafe. Want to learn a trade and make some money? You can do that with a laptop… with online classes and a job in a computer related field. The laptop means you can attend class from virtually anywhere in the world. Even on your vacation to the beach. Computers. It isn’t about what they can do. It is about what you want to do, and how you can get it done with the assistance of a computer. Laptops provide the ability to do this while in motion, or while in a new location.

I’m going to assume you mean what is a laptop used for, because laptops are used by the use of a built in monitor to send output and a keyboard and trackpad for input. But I digress, typically the tasks done on a laptop are not as resource intensive as the tasks done on Desktops. These tasks include word processing, web browsing and light gaming whereas Desktops tend to deal with  video editing, graphic designing, animations, programming and other resource intensive tasks.
